July 1U» 1955.
My dear Wilbur:
I feel somewhat sad about your laving
Illinois. 3ut there’s nothing wrong with
Stanford that a Schramm can’t fix.
As a guy who’s somewhat on the outside,
I don’t mind telling you that in my opinion,
you, more than any other person, provided the
practical help and inspiration that saved the
MASH daring that crucial period, and conse¬
quently educational TV.
Sincerely,
M.S. Novik
PS I’ll never forget that famous swimming pool
conference*
Mr. WilUir Schramm
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
